title: An applied deep reinforcement learning approach to control active networked microgrids in smart cities with multi-level participation of battery energy storage system and electric vehicles
content:
Publication date: 15 July 2024

Source: Sustainable Cities and Society, Volume 107

Author(s): Reza Sepehrzad, Amir Saman Godazi Langeroudi, Amin Khodadadi, Sara Adinehpour, Ahmed Al-Durra, Amjad Anvari-Moghaddam
siteTitle: ScienceDirect Publication: Sustainable Cities and Society
